title: Login Failure
issue: Users are unable to log in to the application.
solution: Reset the server and check the authentication service.

title: Data Not Saving
issue: Changes made by users are not being saved.
solution: Check database connection and query execution.

title: Page Load Timeout
issue: The homepage takes too long to load.
solution: Optimize images and check server response time.

title: Email Notifications Not Sending
issue: Users are not receiving email notifications.
solution: Verify email server settings and SMTP configuration.

title: 404 Error on Profile Page
issue: Users receive a 404 error when trying to access their profile.
solution: Check routing and ensure the profile page exists.

title: Slow Database Queries
issue: Some queries are taking too long to execute.
solution: Optimize the database indices and queries.

title: Mobile Responsiveness Issue
issue: The website is not displaying properly on mobile devices.
solution: Adjust CSS media queries and test on various devices.

title: Payment Gateway Failure
issue: Users cannot complete transactions.
solution: Check the payment gateway API status and logs.

title: Session Timeout Issue
issue: User sessions are timing out too quickly.
solution: Increase the session timeout duration in settings.

title: Search Function Not Working
issue: The search feature is returning no results.
solution: Check the search algorithm and indexing process.

title: User Profile Update Failure
issue: Users are unable to update their profile information.
solution: Check validation rules and database connections.

title: Browser Compatibility Issues
issue: Website does not render properly in Firefox.
solution: Test and update CSS for compatibility with Firefox.

title: File Upload Limit Exceeded
issue: Users cannot upload files larger than 2MB.
solution: Increase file upload size limit in server configuration.

title: Password Reset Email Not Sending
issue: Users do not receive password reset emails.
solution: Check email service configuration and logs.

title: API Rate Limiting Error
issue: API requests are being blocked due to rate limits.
solution: Adjust rate limits in API configuration.

title: Data Migration Failure
issue: Data migration to the new system is failing.
solution: Review migration scripts and logs for errors.

title: SSL Certificate Expiration
issue: SSL certificate for the website has expired.
solution: Renew the SSL certificate immediately.

title: Account Lockout Issue
issue: Users are getting locked out after multiple failed attempts.
solution: Increase the number of allowed login attempts.

title: Content Not Displaying
issue: Some content is not appearing on the website.
solution: Check CMS settings and content publishing status.

title: Analytics Not Recording
issue: Website analytics are not being recorded.
solution: Verify tracking code implementation and configuration.

title: Insufficient Permissions
issue: Some users do not have sufficient permissions.
solution: Review user roles and permissions settings.

title: Incorrect Data Display
issue: Users see incorrect data in reports.
solution: Check data aggregation logic and calculations.

title: Cache Not Clearing
issue: Cached data is not updating as expected.
solution: Review cache settings and purge cache manually.

title: Error 500 on API Requests
issue: Users are receiving a 500 error on API calls.
solution: Check server logs for errors and exceptions.

title: User Feedback Form Not Submitting
issue: Feedback form submissions are failing.
solution: Check form validation and server-side processing.

title: Video Playback Issues
issue: Embedded videos do not play on the site.
solution: Verify video player settings and compatibility.

title: Browser Caching Issues
issue: Old content is showing due to caching.
solution: Instruct users to clear their browser cache.

title: Analytics Dashboard Not Loading
issue: Users cannot access the analytics dashboard.
solution: Check database connectivity and server health.

title: Security Vulnerability Detected
issue: Potential security vulnerability found in the application.
solution: Perform security audit and patch vulnerabilities.

title: Form Validation Errors
issue: Users are encountering validation errors on forms.
solution: Review form validation rules and error handling.

title: Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
issue: XSS vulnerability detected in user input fields.
solution: Sanitize all user inputs to prevent XSS attacks.

title: User Permissions Not Saving
issue: Changes to user permissions are not being saved.
solution: Check database save logic for user permissions.

title: Application Crash on Load
issue: The application crashes upon loading.
solution: Check server logs for errors and resource usage.

title: Search Results Not Displaying
issue: Search results are not showing for users.
solution: Verify search index and data availability.

title: Backup Process Failure
issue: Automated backup process is failing.
solution: Check backup scripts and storage availability.

title: Localization Issues
issue: Some text is not translated in the application.
solution: Review localization files and translations.

title: Chat Feature Not Working
issue: The chat feature is not functioning for users.
solution: Check WebSocket connection and server settings.

title: Data Export Failure
issue: Users cannot export data from the application.
solution: Check export function and permissions.

title: API Documentation Outdated
issue: API documentation is not up-to-date.
solution: Review and update API documentation.

title: Content Delivery Network (CDN) Issues
issue: CDN is not serving resources correctly.
solution: Check CDN configuration and cache settings.

title: Server Overload
issue: Server is experiencing high load and slow response times.
solution: Scale server resources and review load balancer settings.

title: User Account Deactivation Issues
issue: Users cannot deactivate their accounts.
solution: Review account deactivation logic and permissions.

title: Reporting Feature Not Functioning
issue: The reporting feature is not generating reports.
solution: Check reporting logic and data sources.

title: Network Connectivity Issues
issue: Users are experiencing intermittent network connectivity.
solution: Check server network configuration and health.

title: Session Storage Issues
issue: User session data is not being stored properly.
solution: Check session storage configuration.

title: Data Import Errors
issue: Users are encountering errors when importing data.
solution: Review import function and error handling.

title: Legacy Code Issues
issue: Legacy code is causing compatibility issues.
solution: Refactor legacy code and ensure compatibility.

title: Security Audit Recommendations Not Implemented
issue: Previous security audit recommendations have not been implemented.
solution: Review and implement all outstanding recommendations.

title: Unexpected Application Behavior
issue: Users report unexpected behavior in the application.
solution: Investigate user reports and server logs.

title: Third-party Integration Failure
issue: Integration with third-party service is failing.
solution: Check API keys and service status.

title: Unresponsive Design Elements
issue: Certain design elements are unresponsive.
solution: Review CSS and HTML for responsive design issues.

title: Error Messages Not Displaying
issue: Error messages are not visible to users.
solution: Ensure error messages are displayed in the UI.

title: Slow Loading Times
issue: Pages are loading slowly for users.
solution: Optimize images and reduce server response time.

title: Multiple Login Attempts Detected
issue: Multiple failed login attempts detected for an account.
solution: Implement account lockout mechanism after failed attempts.

title: Server Maintenance Notification
issue: Users are not receiving notifications about server maintenance.
solution: Check notification settings and delivery mechanisms.

title: Inconsistent UI Behavior
issue: UI behavior is inconsistent across different browsers.
solution: Test UI across major browsers and resolve discrepancies.

title: Incorrect User Data Displayed
issue: Users see incorrect data displayed in their profiles.
solution: Check data retrieval logic and user permissions.

title: Data Synchronization Issues
issue: Data is not synchronizing across devices.
solution: Investigate synchronization logic and network issues.

title: Payment Processing Errors
issue: Users cannot complete payment transactions.
solution: Check payment gateway integration and logs.

title: User Feedback Form Not Submitting
issue: Users cannot submit feedback forms.
solution: Review form submission logic and error handling.

title: Browser Compatibility Issues
issue: Application is not working correctly on older browsers.
solution: Implement polyfills and check compatibility.
